# airbyte_source_facebook_pages (Resource)

SourceFacebookPages Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "airbyte_source_facebook_pages" "my_source_facebookpages" {
  configuration = {
    access_token = "...my_access_token..."
    page_id      = "...my_page_id..."
  }
  name         = "Leslie Reinger"
  secret_id    = "...my_secret_id..."
  workspace_id = "25aa9f8c-7d41-4070-88d9-ffe8959afeef"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `configuration` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration))
- `name` (String)
- `workspace_id` (String)

### Optional

- `secret_id` (String) Optional secretID obtained through the public API OAuth redirect flow.

### Read-Only

- `source_id` (String)
- `source_type` (String)

<a id="nestedatt--configuration"></a>
### Nested Schema for `configuration`

Required:

- `access_token` (String) Facebook Page Access Token
- `page_id` (String) Page ID
